Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Hassan. Based on the current market rates in Mannheim, I would be willing to rent the apartment to you for 500 Euros per month. I hope this proposal meets your needs, Hassan. If you have any questions or would like to discuss further, please do not hesitate to ask.
